envelope.name: envelope
envelope.description: Envelope format identifier that defines the common metadata information for the message. All definitions in this group share this envelope format. Mixed-envelope-format groups are not permitted. The predefined envelope format is CloudEvents/1.0

protocol.name: protocol
protocol.description: Protocol identifier that defines the transport message protocol. All definitions in this group share this protocol type. Mixed-protocol groups are not permitted. Predefined protocol formats are 'AMQP/1.0', 'MQTT/3.1.1', 'MQTT/5.0', 'KAFKA', 'HTTP', and 'NATS'

*.description: Any other attribute that is common to all definitions in this group

basemessageurl.name: basemessageurl
basemessageurl.description: Reference to a base definition for this definition, either via a (relative) URL or a fragment identifier. The base definition is overridden by this definition. If not present, this definition does not override any base definition

envelope.name: envelope
envelope.description: Message envelope format identifier. This attribute MUST be the same as the 'envelope' attribute of the definition group, but is not automatically inherited because definitions may be cross-referenced across groups. The predefined envelope format is 'CloudEvents/1.0'

envelopemetadata.name: envelopemetadata
envelopemetadata.description: CloudEvents attribute declarations, adding constraints to the CloudEvents envelope not yet covered by the CloudEvents spec https://github.com/cloudevents/spec/blob/main/cloudevents/spec.md

dataschema.name: dataschema
dataschema.description: CloudEvents dataschema https://github.com/cloudevents/spec/blob/main/cloudevents/spec.md#dataschema. The URI of the schema for the event payload. Absence indicates no known schema. This attribute corresponds to the 'dataschemauri' attribute in the message definition and MUST be the same as the 'dataschemauri' attribute of the definition if present.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: Whether CloudEvents 'binary' or 'structured' mode will be used

format.name: format
format.description: The media type format used to serialize the CloudEvent in the case of mode=structured

protocol.name: protocol
protocol.description: Protocol identifier. This attribute MUST be the same as the 'protocol' attribute of the definition group, but is not automatically inherited because definitions may be cross-referenced across groups

type.name: type
type.description: AMQP properties.message-id type constraint. The type values refer to the AMQP type model` and the defined message-id types

key.name: key
key.description: The Apache Kafka key as a UTF-8 uri template. Mutually exclusive with 'key_base64'

key_base64.name: key_base64
key_base64.description: Binary Apache Kafka key as a base64 encoded string. Mutually exclusive with 'key'

path.name: path
path.description: The HTTP path as a uri template

dataschemaformat.name: dataschemaformat
dataschemaformat.description: The schema format applicable to the message payload, equivalent to the 'format' attribute of the schema registry

dataschema.name: dataschema
dataschema.description: The inline schema for the message payload, equivalent to the 'schema' attribute of the schema registry

dataschemauri.name: dataschemauri
dataschemauri.description: The URI of the schema for the message payload, equivalent to the 'schemauri' attribute of the schema registry

datacontenttype.name: datacontenttype
datacontenttype.description: The content type for the message payload
